titleStmt.title: Tamiḻneṟi Viḷakkam 16.
Experimenting with formatting for the final edition.

div.p: Questioning [the hero], letting out [the secret], reproaching [him], refusing, [friend’s] suffering, [when asked] ‘Where?’ saying ‘In such a place.’, seeing the woman, classifying [her as] agreeable, speaking to the hero, making it clear that he cannot bear and sending [her] off to the old ones (i.e. her family) - these are the union [by means of] the friend.

body.head: Commentary
body.p: The quoted [cūttiram] intends to make known the way in which the meeting [by means of the] friend occurs.

pāṅkaṉ ṟalaimakaṟkuṟṟa viṉātalun talaimakaṉ iṉṉateṉṟalum pāṅkaṉ kaḻaṟalun talaimakaṉ kaḻaṟṟetir maṟuttalum pāṅkaṉōtalum evviṭattevvuru veṉṟalun talaimakaṉ iṉṉa viṭattiṉṉa vuru veṉṟalum pāṅkaṉ avviṭattavvuruk kāṇṭalun talaimakaṉaip perumai kūṟalum peyarntu vantu talaimakaṟkuraittalun talaimakaṉ ṟalaimakaḷaik kaṇṭaṇaitalum uṟaviṉ āṟṟāṉ kūṟalum viṭuttalum pāṅkaṟ kūṭṭam ām eṉṟa vāṟu.

div.p: eṉpatu talaimakaṉ aṇaital uṟaviṉ āṟṟāṉ kūṟiyatu.
